preqs: MKF1120 and any four second level units from Faculty of Business and Economics.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points at levels {2, 3} from units owned by {50000563, 50000781, 50000782, 50000783, 50000784, 50000793, 50000794, 50168343, 50168344} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MKF1120, MKP1120})
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {MKF3141%, MKT3141, MKW3141, MKX3141, SYM3141}

description: The unit is designed to sensitise students to the issues which affect a firm's ability to compete effectively, and from which competitive advantage is derived.
